name: Wait, Pancakes are Free Now?
description:
One day the mayor Pancake Town decides to announce that ALL PANCAKES ARE NOW FREE FOR ALL TO GRAB!
You being a normal fast food worker named Rob have to take on a hungry horde of pancake loving customers all by yourself...

INSTRUCTIONS:

Look around with your mouse and left click to swing your pan, hitting  pancake will make that pancake fly in the direction of the pan, try hitting customers with the pancakes to make them go away!
